Question: Shenzhen Maono Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MAONO Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Audio Microphone Devices

- Maonocaster AME2 and PD400X Podcasting Equipment Bundle
- DM30RGB gaming microphone awarded the CES 2023 Innovation Award
- Microphones supporting USB and XLR dual connectivity, such as PD200X podcasting USB and XLR microphone
- New products G1 Neo Mixer and PD100X Mic
- Maonocaster E3 audio interface, winner of the IF Design Awards 2023
- Offline activities include on-site game experience, limited-time coupons, and more
- Exhibiting at CES 2024 and NAMM Show 2024, showcasing latest and innovative audio products
- Commitment to enhancing content creation and opening up more possibilities
- Offering a variety of exciting and intriguing activities for attendees
- Exhibiting at CES 2024, showcasing upcoming new products and hosting games with free surprises and gifts.
Summary_cn:
MAONO科技有限公司。

产品：音频麦克风设备

- Maonocaster AME2和PD400X播客设备套装
- DM30RGB游戏麦克风荣获2023年CES创新奖
- 支持USB和XLR双重连接的麦克风，如PD200X播客USB和XLR麦克风
- 新产品G1 Neo Mixer和PD100X麦克风
- Maonocaster E3音频接口，荣获IF设计奖2023
- 线下活动包括现场游戏体验、限时优惠券等
- 参展CES 2024和NAMM Show 2024，展示最新和创新的音频产品
- 致力于提升内容创作，并开启更多可能性
- 为与会者提供各种令人兴奋和引人入胜的活动
- 参展CES 2024，展示即将推出的新产品，并举办游戏赠送惊喜礼品。
